sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{7590b8c1-0080-4df5-865b-c0b0ca9dec2e.item.number}} Was automatically closed because its due day of {{7590b8c1-0080-4df5-865b-c0b0ca9dec2e.item.due_date}} was older than autoCloseOverdue setting of {{a019ef37-910a-4a9a-bf88-80cfd30143e8.property_value}} days.
